product_name: Sugoi Evo-X Bike Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Versatile for trail riding or around-town wear, the men's Sugoi Evo-X Bike Shorts keep you comfortable with their ergonomic stretch and airflow. Removable liner brief features a gel chamois for all-day comfort. Durable stretch-woven outer shell provides ergonomic comfort during dynamic pedaling. Stretchy nylon/spandex fabric wicks away moisture and dries fast. Zoned mesh panels enhance airflow and breathability. Sugoi Evo-X Bike Shorts have a 2-snap front closure; inset waist tabs adjust for a comfortable, secure fit. Closeout.
short_description: Versatile for trail riding or around-town wear, the men's Sugoi Evo-X Bike Shorts keep you comfortable with their ergonomic stretch and airflow.
